reviewText: Brought back major memories of my youth.

These are second rate Blaxploitation films.  Even second rate Blaxploitation can be fun, but the transfers are so awful, none of the films in the set are worth watching.  It looks like DVD transfers of video tapes of badly maintained originals.  They are all very blurry and the sound is quite muffled.  A guaranteed headache if you try to watch any of them.
It was nice to watch these old movies. I just wish the quality was a little better. I recommend them.
I assumed this was a box set but it is 3 DVDs that come shank-wrapped together. No big deal since the movies are so great and the price is cheap.
